properties.areaDesc: Interior Hancock; Southern Piscataquis; Central Washington; Central Penobscot; Southern Penobscot; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 5 at 4:14AM EST until February 8 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow
accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, sleet accumulations of around
three quarters of an inch and ice accumulations of up to two
tenths of an inch possible.

* WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Interior
DownEast and Penobscot Valley Maine.

* WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Friday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening
commute.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant
snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue
to monitor the latest forecasts.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
